name: Street Hero
description:
This game lets you play as a comic book-style superhero with flight ability, agility, super strength, and ultimate combat skills in a big open-world city full of super-villains. Use your powers wisely to defeat the villains and save citizens. Become the hero everyone deserves.

Features

  • Free-flow combat system: a combat system inspired from Batman Arkham series which allows players to attack over a much larger distance with much more power as your combo count goes up. Players need to dodge and counter enemies' attacks to keep the combo flow going
  • Large open-world city: A big city full of pedestrians and vehicles with 3 types of weather to select.
  • Various enemy types and bosses: The game features several different types of challenging enemies that required different ways to takedown.

This game is an indie singleplayer game made by one person who loves comicbook superheroes deeply since childhood. The game is currently under development to fix bugs, add boss-fights, costumes to unlock (by progressing through the game, not micro-transactions, I dont do that here) and will be released when it's ready and properly tested. Thank you and stay safe during the pandemic.
